name: calculate_drawing_probability
description: Calculates the probability of drawing at least a specified number of satisfying items from a given total using the Hypergeometric Probability Distribution.

total_items.description: The total number of items in the pool.

satisfying_items.description: The number of items that meet the desired condition (e.g., special items, correct choices).

drawn_items.description: The number of items drawn from the pool.

expect_items.description: The minimum number of satisfying items required in the draw.
